sections.heading: Repealed.Section 18-15-2 - Repealed.Section 18-15-3 - Repealed.Section 18-15-4 - Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 2007, ch. 83, § 1; repealed by Laws 2019, ch. 165, § 7.

Repeals.— Laws 2019, ch. 165, § 7 repealed 18-15-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 2007, ch. 83, § 1, relating to short title, effective July 1, 2019. For provisions of former section,seethe 2018 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
